text:
e="preserve">Goh Cheng Liang (; born 1927) is a Singaporean billionaire businessman. He founded Wuthelam Holdings, which manufactures paint and coatings.
He set up his first paint shop there in Singapore in 1955. It became the main distributor there for Nippon Paint in 1962. Wuthelam Holdings, which now has interests in the paint business and property development, was founded in 1974.
